markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Nightvision Adaptation](/Feats.aspx?ID=2464) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Android" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=334" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 72 <sup>3.0</sup>

</column>

---

The nanites in your ocular processors have adapted to darkness, enhancing your ability to see in the dark. You gain [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415).
name: Nightvision Adaptation
